org.jboss.modules

Class ModuleContentLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.modules.ModuleContentLoader

  • public final class ModuleContentLoader
extends Object
    Module content loader used to load resources from a collection of ResourceLoaders.
    Author:
    John Bailey, David M. Lloyd

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ModuleContentLoader.Builder
      A builder for a module content loader.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ModuleContentLoader EMPTY
      The empty module content loader.

      • build

        public static ModuleContentLoader.Builder build()
        Build a new module content loader.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • getResourceLoader

        public ResourceLoader getResourceLoader(String root)
        Get a resource loader by a root name
        Parameters:
        root - The resource loader root
        Returns:
        The ResourceLoader at the provided root or null if not found

      • getResource

        public Resource getResource(String name)
        Get a resource by name. Will return the first resource found within the resource loaders.
        Parameters:
        name - The resource name
        Returns:
        The resource or null if not found in any resource loader

      • getResource

        public Resource getResource(String root,
                            String name)
        Get a resource from a specific root.
        Parameters:
        root - The root to get the resource from
        name - The name of the resource
        Returns:
        The resource or null if not found

      • getResources

        public Iterable<Resource> getResources(String name)
        Get all resources for a specific name. This will check each resource loader to find the resource and will return all resources found.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the resource
        Returns:
        The Resource or an empty Iterable if none are found

      • getClassSpec

        public ClassSpec getClassSpec(String className)
                       throws IOException
        Get the class specification by checking all resource loaders and returning the first instance found.
        Parameters:
        className - The class name to get the specification for
        Returns:
        The ClassSpec or null if not found
        Throws:
        IOException - If any issues occur getting the class spec

      • getPackageSpec

        public PackageSpec getPackageSpec(String packageName)
                           throws IOException
        Get the package specification by checking all resource loaders and returning the first instance found.
        Parameters:
        packageName - The class name to get the specification for
        Returns:
        The ClassSpec or null if not found
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getLibrary

        public String getLibrary(String libname)
        Get a library file with the given name by checking all resource loaders and returning the first instance found.
        Parameters:
        libname - the library name
        Returns:
        the path of the library file

        public Set<String> getLocalPaths()
        Get the local paths exported by this content loader.
        Returns:
        the local paths
